description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。
description.en: At the completion will have learned of this course:1. Multiple stage and cascade refrigeration systems technology.2. Refrigerant characteristics for low-temperature cycle.3. Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程首先探討學校評鑑理論與實務相關議題，其次瞭解各國技職學校評鑑現況，並提出相關資訊以作為修正與改進當前技職學校評鑑實務的指引。
description.en: This course first discusses the concept of school evaluation, followed by a presentation of case studies of school evaluation from across the World. We also provide information to project staff and key stakeholders as a guide for revision and improvement of project plans, management, utilization of resources and training activities

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學校公共關係之理論與實務，提供修課學生對學校公共關係的認識。
description.en: The course is designed to develop the ability to manage the school public relation by exploring the concept and principles of school public relation and analyzing the current issues challenging all kinds of  educational institutes.

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行主題探討，同時，就技職教育與訓練或人力資源等領域的相關從業人員進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: The course aims to (1) exploration of the main research in occupation analysis, (2) exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education and training program or in the field of human resource. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」
description.en: HS is a thinking model for problem solving, an analysis of the 'known' in order to master the 'unknown' to solve the problem.  The subjective party's cognition is guided by the HS manipulating model, the transfer from 'unknown' to 'known', lets the subjective party construct a heuristic structure in between known and unknown.  The HS theory instruction consists of two courses 1,"The Heuristic Structure Theory"2,"The Application of The Heuristic Structure Theory"

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 授課內容主要在介紹從事都市計畫或都市設計經常習用有關都市方面的資料蒐集、調查以及分析的各種方法，重點涵蓋都市空間理論、人口、產業、交通成長理論及相關的資料調查技術。所使用的分析方法包括統計分析、模式運用、地理資訊系統及試算表分析等，並以實例介紹有關都市人口、產業活動、交通運輸量的分析及預測，使學生能將學習的理論與與實務相結合，增進都市分析的專業能力。
description.en: The course focus is on the training of urban analysis methods to urban planning and design professions. The theories about urban spatial planning, population forecasting, economic development, and transportation analysis are introduced. Emphasis is laid on the methods of data collection and investigation techniques, geographic information system operation, statistics analysis, and spreadsheet utilization. Students are required to complete some related applications to improve both their academic abilities and professional capabilities.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

name.en: Special Topics of Universal Design in Furniture

description.zh: 全適化設計在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足每一個使用者的需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認全適化設計思維方法與實務，本課程著重於全適化設計理論在家具設計上的應用。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究快速原型之原理與方法，並藉設計實例演練，以達熟悉研究快速原型之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the principle and method of rapid prototype.  By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of rapid prototype.

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

description.zh: 由最原始的原點即動物的觀點，觀看並理解「人類」所營造出的空間領域，並討論其意義及重要性。
description.en: The course focuses on observation and understanding the territory created by human in terms of the viewpoint of animals, which could be the most original one, and discuss the importance and the meaning.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

notes: 不接受旁聽, 上限15人

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括：(1)岩石材料與岩體的工程意義、(2)岩石應力與應變的關係與工程意義、(3) 岩石變形性與強度的工程意義(4)如何辨識不穩定邊坡(5)如何辨識不穩定隧道(6)岩石工程設計理念(7)案例研究等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [II] consist of (1) Rock Material and Rock Mass (2)Stress and Stength (3)Deformability and Stength (4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope  (5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel (6)Rock Engineering Design (7) Engineering Case Studies.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 1.無線感測網路架構2.無線感測網路實體層3.無線感測網路連結層4.無線感測網路網路層5.無線感測網路天線與電波傳播6.無線感測網路標準
description.en: 1.WSN Architectures2.WSN Physical Layer3.WSN Link Layer4.WSN Network Layer5.WSN Antennas and Propagation6.WSN Standards

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

notes: 教室科研825上課時間(六)5.6.7節

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises.  Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

notes: 教室科研825上課時間(六)2.3.4節

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of  emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI與企業資源規劃、BI與電子商務、BI與顧客關係管理等議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，EMBA班學生可以討論其熟悉產業之KPI，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: Business intelligence (BI) is a business management term which refers to applications and technologies which are used to gather, provide access to, and analyze data and information about their company operations. Business intelligence systems can help companies have a more comprehensive knowledge of the factors affecting their business, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and they can help companies to make better business decisions. In this course, shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques, such as RFID, will be introduced firstly. Database and data warehouse concepts will also be mentioned. Applications of BI in ERP, EC and CRM will be the important focus of this course. Students will have a chance to implement BI software based on his business-related data in this course.

name.zh: 智慧財產權與專利管理
name.en: Intellectual Property Rights and patent management

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解智慧財產權與專利管理，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行：（1）智慧財產權基本觀念與實務，（2）專利資訊分析，（3）專利演化與發展，（4）創意產出，（5）專利申請與保護， (6)專利佈局，（7）專利侵權鑑定，（8）專利迴避設計，（9）案例分析。
description.en: This course teaches and coaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management, including topics as follows:（1）Basic knowledge and practices of Intellectual Property Rights;（2）The analysis of patent information;（3）The evolution and development for patent;（4）Innovative idea generation; （5）Application and protection of patent（6）Patent strategy（7）Patent violation，（8）Patent avoidance，（9）Cases study.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

notes: 教室科研823上課時間(六)2.3.4節

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises.  Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

notes: 郭佳瑋(1)教室科研823上課時間(六)5.6.7節

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研二課程目標： 透過設計課題培養自實質至非實質環境與實踐之總體操作能力 ，其深度與廣度將是評價判準。 課程概要： 就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程 書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 2nd Grade Through different design topics, the disciples accomplish the course goal－enhancing the ability of general manipulation and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation, which includes design result and a report of the process of ascertainment, will be required for evaluation. The evaluation will emphasize on the depth and width of ascertainment and practice.

name.zh: 嵌入式匯流平台之人機互動
name.en: Embedded Multimedia Convergence Platform and Interaction Systems

description.zh: 本課程將提供學生如何學習整合嵌入式系統與手持行動裝置以及電腦視覺技術，利用電腦視覺技術，進行影像擷取，並分析影像中所表示之操作指令，並將分析結果轉換為電腦操作指令，已達到人機互動之功效，並整合實現於一套嵌入式系統或手持行動裝置平台上，除了讓學生可學習電腦視覺技術，也藉由嵌入式實現之途徑，學習到軟硬體整合之經驗。
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with design methodologies, tools, and implementation practices of embedded multimedia convergence systems and human-computer interaction applications. Its topics include: 1. Embedded multimedia system development platform and tool-chains. 2. Embedded multimedia convergence systems. 3. Developing embedded software using opensource GUI and computer vision libraries. 4. Heterogeneous multi-core embedded platforms. 5. Vision-based techniques for intelligent human-computer interaction.

description.zh: 本課程將引導學生學習網際網路實務與路由規劃、寬頻匯流網路之架構、寬頻有線及寬頻無線技術原理以及封包傳輸技術、封包分類與服務品質保證之概念、寬頻匯流網路管理協定與監測、網管工具應用與實驗、以及相關工具軟體使用，除基本原理闡述外更包含多項實驗課程，使學生能熟悉寬頻匯流網路、管理、原理與運作，更可經由動手實做之訓練過程中獲得實務經驗，期使修課學生有足夠能力與自信從事寬頻網路技術及管理相關工作。
description.en: The objective of this course is to establish the basis of broadband convergence networks and network management skills. The topics include: (1) Internet engineering, (2) Broadband wired networks and packet transmission technology, (3) Broadband wireless networks and packet transmission technology, (4) Broadband convergence networks and operations, and (5) Broadband network managements and experiments.

description.zh: 本課程提供行動計算上一些主題之深入介紹，這些主題包括：(1)行動通訊及系統介紹，(2)資料管理(3)行動資料庫及交易管理(4)位置管理(5)行動IP(6)單一/多人路由(7)資訊安全
description.en: This course provides a comperhensive overview of several topics related to mobile computing. These topics includes:(1)State-of-Art in Mobile (2)Data Management (3)Mobile Database and Transaction Management (4)Location Management, (5)Mobile IP (6)Unicast/Multicast Routing,and(7)Security.

name.en: Special Topics in Digital Signal Processing

description.zh: 本課程將深入探討一項或數項特定之數位信號處理技術。探討的主題如多取樣率信號處理，頻譜估測，定點運算DSP CPU之介紹，定點運算之正規化及溢位之處理，其他實做之議題，及個案研究等。
description.en: Thorough treatment of special topics in digital signal processing technologies such as multi-rate signal processing,spectral estimation, intro to fixed-opint DSP CPU,normalization and overflow protection, implementation issues, and case studies.

notes: 資工所和電資國際專班合開

description.zh: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論、架構與應用。學生透過此課程實做一個智慧型代理人系統，以瞭解代理人技術與應用。課程主要內容包括 - 1.多代理人理論與架構，2. 機器學習與代理人調適，3. 協調技術，4. 合作與競爭，5.賽局理論與決策，6.知識本體論， 7.網路服務。本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: Intelligent agents integrate artificial intelligence, network, distributed computing and web technology. This course introduces the state of  the art of intelligent agents, its theories,  languages, architectures and applications. Students can learn from the course the basic concepts and understanding of agent system through the course. The content includes the intelligent agents about - 1.Fundamental theories and architectures, 2. Machine learning and adaptive agents, 3.Negotiation and coordination, 4 Cooperative and competitive problem solving, 5. Game theories and decision making,  6. Ontology and knowledge sharing, 7.Semantic web and web services.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS, Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCA Factor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering, Project

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習各種運籌系統分析的模式與方法，主要分別從供給面與需求面探討運籌系統，並且探討供給與需求之間的均衡分析。課程內容包含：網路設計、分析與最佳化、等候理論、網路均衡指派、動態網路分析、以及商用車輛營運管理與車輛路線問題等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the models and algorithms for logistics system analysis. In addition to discussing the supply and demand sides of logistics systems, this course aims to analyze the equilibrium between supply and demand. The main topics include, but not limited to, network design, analysis, and optimization, queueing theory, network equilibrium assignment, dynamic network analysis, and commercial vehicle operation and vehicle routing and scheduling.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1.知識發現與資料探勘概論 2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3.資料處理技術 4.教導型學習方法 5.教導型學習方法 6.關聯法則探勘 7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

name.en: Case Study of Corporate Merger & Acquisition

description.zh: 本課程個案研究目標公司包括科技公司與金融機構，可能牽涉之法律有：企業併購法、公司法、證券交易法、金融機構合併法、金融控股公司法、勞動基準法等。本課程主要內容有1.概括併購政策議題。 2.併購交易的財務結構、會計、評價與法律議題。
description.en: This course covers several topics: 1. General policy issues surrounding mergers and acquisitions. 2. The financial structuring of the deal, accounting issues, valuation, and legal issues.

notes: 由國巨律師事務所幸大智律師共同授課,限北區5人

name.zh: 智慧財產權商品化應用

description.zh: 本課程主要內容有1.智財權組合2.商品化考慮因素3.商品化過程
description.en: This course will emphasize on 1. Combination of intellectual properties 2. Factors affect the commercialization process and 3. Commercialization process.

name.zh: 智慧財產權服務業商業模式
name.en: Business Model of Intellectual Property Service Industry

description.zh: 智慧財產權的應用由於NPE之興起，引起全世界的重視，歐美大公司視為未來重要策略。為了培養本國智慧財產權服務業，本課程將探討國際上近年來興起的智慧財產權各種商業模式，評估其優劣點及台灣可能發展應用之方向。
description.en: The application of intellectual property is a hot topic internationally. Especially, the rising of NPE litigation or other legal practices. In order to bring up the service industry of intellectual property in Taiwan. This course will emphasize the business model of intellectual property service industry worldwide. Comparison and application between Taiwan and other countries will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程將探討互動科技運用於當代表演藝術之可能性與相關發展，並介紹互動表演形式與美學、電腦視覺與電腦聆聽、即時影像處理、即時音訊合成等，並藉由實際展演計畫之提案與執行，透過跨領域合作，讓學生有機會將互動科技與表演藝術結合。「互動表演藝術 II」將注重表演計畫之實際執行、跨界合作之溝通與協調、即時互動影像設計、時序設計、相關軟硬體設置、與實際排練。
description.en: This course will explore the potential of incorporating interactive technology in performing arts and will also review the existing repertoire. In addition, topics about the form, the aesthetics of interactive performing arts, computer vision, computer listening, real-time video processing, and real-time audio synthesis will also be covered. Students will be asked to bring forth their proposal of interactive performing arts and to realize their work through formal presentation combining interactive technology and performing arts. "Interactive Performing Arts II" will deal mainly with proposal realization, interdisciplinary cooperation, real-time interactive video design, sequential design, equipment setup, and rehearsal arrangement.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹準則作曲的概念與技巧、並教導使用 Max/MSP/Jitter 物件導向程式設計工具，來設計準則作曲系統與即時音訊處理工具。主要內容將包含：準則作曲程式設計、即時音訊之播放與錄音系統設計、音色合成與再合成、數位效果器之設計。此外，本課程亦將介紹音訊偵測與分析技巧。學生將被要求以 Max/MSP/Jitter 設計聲音裝置、互動音樂展演系統、或音樂教學程式，透過實作來學習音樂、音訊相關的程式設計。
description.en: This course will focus upon algorithmic composition and real-time audio processing using object-oriented programming language Max/MSP/Jitter. Subjects including algorithmic composition, real-time audio recording, playback, synthesis, re-synthesis, and effects will be covered. Techniques about audio detection and analysis will also be introduced. Students will be asked to build a system with Max/MSP for sound installations, real-time interactive music, or music pedagogy.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。

資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

name.en: Special Topic on Chemical Technological Industry

description.zh: 探討國內化工業科技產業，包括能源、環保、資訊、生技等與化工技術密切相關之產業。
description.en: The discussions on the chemical technological industry in Taiwan which includes Energy, Environmental Protection, Information Technology, Biochemistry Technology and so on that closely related to the chemical technology.

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。

description.en: Introduction to the relationships between consumer behavior and product design. The trends of markets and the consumption characteristics are studied to make the plan of product development and set up the design strategy.

description.zh: 本課程從民族性及文化進步的過程，探討家具之演化和人類生活環境變遷之關係，本課程特別著重在探討研究家具造形與建築樣式與建構之相互關係。
description.en: A general study of furniture evolution that is inspired by the change of living environment and culture evolution. The correlative factor between furniture form and architectural patterns is to be deliberating in the study.。

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.
