name.en: Indoor Air Quality Control and management

description.zh: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, air pollutants, fresh air and air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air quality control, management and regulation, indoor air cleaners.

description.zh: 1.簡介  2.隨機向量之性質  3.假設測試  4.參數分類  5.參數估計 6.非參數密度估計  7.非參數分類和錯誤估計  8.連續參數估計9.特徵抽取線性對應信號表示  10. 特徵抽取線性對應分類11.分群法  12.應用
description.en: 1. Introduction  2.Random vectors and their properties  3.Hypothesis testing   4. Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 文化資產保存在廿一世紀初的今天，已經是一個必須討?的課題。而在文化資產保存的相關課題?，建築保存的問題是非常繁複的一環，尤其一、二百??在西歐國家的討?與發展之下，建築?的文化資產保存已經發展出特定的概?與作法，即?在廿世紀下半?已經逐漸成熟的文化資產保存概?與??，將文化資產的定義重新進???視與界定，而使得文化資產的概?與對象變得多元，然而，建築保存與其再?用的課題仍然是文化資產保存課題下至為重要的一個重點。保存的目的，是為??史的?證，但是建築空間與建築體保存之後面?另外一個課題，即再?用的問題。被認定具備?史價值的建築，常常可能在建築的結構與規模上有使用的困難?，因而再?用的課題會是建築保存後所亟需面對。本課程將針對建築的保存、修?與再?用進?分析，以及透過保存與再?用案?的?型分析，討?各種空間再?用的可能性，也從上述的案??討?再?用手法的新空間與舊建築體之間的存在、物化的?史記憶，以及新與舊在同一棟建築?的辯證關係。
description.en: In this beginning of 21st Century, the preservation of cultural heritage becomes a necessary issue. Preservation of architecture is one of the most important works in this issue. Since one or two centuries, European has developed its appropriate concept and practice on the preservation of architectural heritage, which fit to their proper cultural context. Though the definition of cultural heritage has been reviewed and derived into some very rich aspects in the second half of 20th Century, the preservation and the rehabilitation of architecture keep its importance among the preservation issues of cultural heritage.The purpose of preservation is to witness history. We found big problem after having preserved architectural spaces and buildings themselves, which is the rehabilitation. Some buildings to be recognized of historical value and have been put in the process of protection could face some difficulties on reuse because of their spaces or structural limits. This is what a buildin

description.zh: 新興數位學習媒體的開發日新月異，再加上資訊存取的高效能數位化，使得科技輔助的數位學習之路更形寬廣、開闊。電子書於知識傳遞的介面上，扮演了關鍵性的角色。傳統上以行為理論推衍而來的人機介面學習模式已然過於狹隘，因為數位時代中的學習者角色已由被動轉為主動，由行為導向轉為認知導向、意義導向以及脈絡導向，而資訊的解讀與詮釋更從單一性、制式化轉為開放性、多元化。對於致力於創新數位學習科技的開發者而言，針對學習者的學習模式重新加以審視是極為迫切的，如此方能以嶄新的角度去開發新的學習潛能和發展性。本課程目的即是從心理學、認知科學及資訊處理的角度來探討新型數位學習模式以及其應用方法，並探討數位學習成效評估系統的建立方案，形塑電子書於知識鴻海的無限可能。
description.en: The rapid development of digital learning and emerging learning technologies, as well as effective information storage platforms, have made traditional learning theory insufficient and less productive in guiding instructional designs for contemporary educational development. New available learning technologies therefore call for the need to re-consider new learning theories. For that, the definitions and mechanism of learning and learners have become more multidimensional and open-ended, instead of being singular and standardized in conventional perception. For those who are devoted to create new technological applications for learning, it is no doubt critical to construct new mechanism of learning in current highly digitized era. This course will discuss relevant cognitive learning theories from research in psychology and education, and contemplate how new e-learning solutions can be evaluated.

name.en: Special Topics on Engineering Information Management

description.zh: 本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹國內外工程資訊管理及營建自動化案例，包含資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型應用，國內外工程資訊管理案例探討，工程資訊之分析與設計，資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
description.en: This course will provide students with the application of engineering information management and the practice of construction management system, management information system concept, the introduction of database design, building information management application, web-based project management system development, integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction automation application, the future of engineering information management and other special topics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 智慧型製造系統、2.MES 系統、3.通訊介面標準與設計、4.遠端監控、5.智慧型偵測與診斷、6.容錯系統、7.介面整合
description.en: 1.Introduction on intelligent manufacturing system 2.MES system 3.Standard and design for communication interfaces 4.Remote monitoring 5.Intelligent monitoring and diagnostics 6.Faults tolerant system 7.Integration for interfaces

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

name.zh: 生技相關產業優良製造規範

description.zh: 由於人口老化、國民所得提高、醫療支出增加與各種流行性傳染病等相關議題，生技相關產業已被世界公認為二十一世紀最具發展潛力之產業。下一波台灣的高科技產業應著重於以發明與創新為主的產業，而生技相關產業正是我國決定要發展之重大新興產業。由於生技相關產業應用範圍廣，附加價值高，故為提升其產業競爭力且加速進入國際市場，國內生技相關產業除了須提升產品品質、加強國際化的管理之外，亦須通過各國所採用的認證制度。此外，政府如何建構一健全完善的法規管理制度，更是生技相關產業發展成功的必要條件。目前國內醫藥產品相關法規，包括藥事法、醫療器材優良製造規範（GMP）及藥品優良製造規範（cGMP）等。由於近年國內外細胞療法之迅速發展，且人體細胞組織物之管理操作與傳統藥品並非完全相同之原因，我國特別訂定人體細胞組織優良操作規範（Good Tissue Practice，GTP），其目的為預防因使用人體細胞組織物而導入、傳播及擴散傳染病，並期望協助機構確保其人體細胞組織物未含有傳染病病原，在製造過程中未受污染，且不致因製造不當而影響人體細胞組織物效用與完整性。
description.en: Biotechnology-related industry has been recognized as the most potential business in twenty-first century. The next step of Taiwan's high technology should focus on the invention and innovation-based industry, which biotechnology should be included. Medical technology is a high value-added, application-board industry. To enhance its competitiveness and speed up access to international markets, producers need to ensure the product quality, strengthen the international management, conformity the regulation in all different countries. At present, the relevant laws and regulations of pharmaceutical products include the followings: the Pharmaceutical Affairs Law, good manufacturing practice of medical device (GMP), pharmaceutical Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP) and the rapid development of cell therapy and the management of human cells and tissues (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) .

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學消防設備與法規方面之基礎，以為將來投身防火工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含:消防與建築法規、滅火設備、警報設備、避難逃生設備、消防搶救上之必要設備等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: code of building and fire-fighting、outfire facilities、warning  message facilities 、refuge facilities and fire-fighting santch facilities etc.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程從民族性及文化進步的過程，探討家具之演化和人類生活環境變遷之關係，本課程特別著重在探討研究家具造形與建築樣式與建構之相互關係。
description.en: A general study of furniture evolution that is inspired by the change of living environment and culture evolution. The correlative factor between furniture form and architectural patterns is to be deliberating in the study.。

name.zh: 產品分析與產品服務系統
name.en: Product Analysis and Product Service System

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討並演練各種分析工具與手段，藉以解析市場產品的功能、使用性、材料與製造、文化與美感，並解析顧客的需求與渴望。在此基礎下，導入產品服務系統(Product Service System)的理論，以更寬廣的視野探討消費者的需求，並以workshop驗證之。
description.en: Product Analysis is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Through product analysis, designers interpret characteristics of every single product of a specific market and gain a summary of the competition among brands. Lecture on methods of product analysis will be given followed by case studies and practice. Furthermore, the concept and theory of Product Service System (PSS) will be engaged to enhance a broader vision to customers' requirement. A marketable set of products and services is capable of jointly fulfilling a user's needs and having a lower environmental impact than traditional business models. Workshop will be carried out to fulfill this aspiration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

description.zh: 1. 變頻器2. 電力轉換器3. 直流截波器4. 電源供應器
description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 專題討論綠建築設計包括生物多樣性、綠化量、基地保水、水資源、日常節能、二氧化碳減量、廢棄物減量、室內環境、污水垃圾改善等評估指標內容以及其他有關綠建築設計手法，在創新設計的發想、理念、技術與案例。
description.en: The topic is discussed with green building assessment indicator including biodiversity, greenery, soil water content, daily energy saving, co2 emission reduction, indoor environment, water resource, sewage and garbage improvement, and other green building design method. To discuss about concept, principle, technique, case study for innovation design .

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討服務設計的屬性與特質，應用既存的設計工具與方法，發展適用於服務領域的設計架構．講述各項應用於設計發想與分析的工具，包括：touch points analysis，scenario planning，storyboards，Service Quality等．
description.en: Economic conditions have changed from a manufacturing society to an information- and service-based economy. Within Service Design, Service Interfaces are designed for intangible products that are, from the customer's point of view, useful, profitable and desirable. This course explores the process and framework of service design. The process of service design applies explorative, generative, and evaluative design approaches. Designers observe and interpret requirements and behavioral patterns and then visualize, formulate, and choreograph solutions to problems. Tools that help to accomplish a successful service design are introduced. The analysis of existing services examines whether touch points are correctly positioned. Scenario Planning starts with the development of the client journey as a schema by which service design can capture and illustrate the complete process of a service with its emotional, material and procedural components from a client's perspective. Storyboards illus

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: Theory and application of groundwater flow modeling,focusing on MODFLOW.Numerical methods.Discretization and boundaries.Parameterization and calibration.Problems and case-histories.

description.zh: 隨著資訊技術與網路科技的發展，促成了城市發展的新樣態。IBM公司在全球化背景下針對社會變遷、科技應用、綠能環保、及永續發展等問題，提出了「智慧城市」的新思維。在國際間也引發其研究與規劃的創新領域。台灣近幾年來為能達成「智慧台灣」的發展目標，並推動台灣的智慧城市及相關產業發展，經濟部技術處在2009年中成立了「經濟部智慧生活科技運用計畫推動辦公室」，以推動智慧生活科技運用計畫，除將帶動「智慧生活」產業的發展，也將師法國外典範進行「智慧城市」的規劃，打造台灣的智慧城市。本課程即在上述國家重大發展策略的架構下，引領建築與都市設計研究所的研究生，透過專論與實作的方式，探討未來「智慧城市」的思維，並透過與資訊科技跨領域知識的整合，融入智慧生活的需求，提出「智慧城市」規劃的架構、願景與策略。
description.en: This course introduces graduate students to the newly developed concept about the intelligent cities and how they are planned and implemented. The concept of intelligent city was proposed by the IBM with globalization background. It is a new and innovation research field, which include inter-discipline integration. The course is organized into two parts: Part1 explore the Basic which to form an intelligent city. It will start with classroom lecture, speech and paper reading and using intelligent cities case study around the world as references. We will examine the key components that form an intelligent city. Part2 will use a target community as a practical case study area and use people participation and community enforcement model to propose a prototype of an intelligent city will be. The results will be illustrated and presented to the local community.

description.zh: 面對地球資源逐漸枯竭的當下, 投入大量生產物量的建築興建模式必須有所變革, 才能因應減低環境負荷的需求。目前建築資源能否有效地再利用的課題在各先進國家受到相當多的矚目。故本課程以介紹海外各種再利用的案例手法為出發點, 並配合台灣地區國情探討建築再利用的可能性與面臨課題。專題討論內容 :1.建築再利用之導論與定義； 2.建築再利用的主要理論與手法；3. 歐洲及日本的既有地區性集合住宅群的再生實例探討；4. 建築填充體的更新 ；5. 建物內的隔間改造與擴充, 建築 主體的增建與減建；6.外部裝修的保存與再利用；7. 建築資材的他用途轉用；8.建築再利用與都市更新；9. 建築再利用於台灣面臨的多面向課題(法令與市場)。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the management of building projects, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.zh: 自動化系統設計與實習
name.en: Experiments and Design for Automatic Systems

description.zh: 培養理論與實務兼備之自動化工程專業人才，除課堂講授與強化實驗實習課程外，更提供應用微處理器之自動控制實務與實習:包含電子儀器之使用說明、虛擬儀表設計、Arduino單晶片之應用。使同學在自動化系統設計與機電整合等領域，加強實務能力。
description.en: Introduction to design for automatic system，control systems ，microchip，system on chip，virtual instruments and experiments for AD/DA, DIDO, and applications for automatic system.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2.探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3.進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4.學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 1. 基礎	1.1 使用者之特性	1.2 電腦之特性	1.3 人機互動2. 設計	2.1 可用性之原理	2.2 設計程序	2.3 使用者之模式	2.4 工作分析	2.5 對話記號及設計	2.6 系統模式	2.7 實作工具及支援	2.8 評估技術	2.9 線上協助及文件3. 進階課題	3.1 群體工作軟體	3.2 CSCW 課題及理論	3.3 多重感測系統

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的迅速發展，網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得網路商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求，本課程講授行銷管理實務的經營能力。本課程以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷管理實務的重點議題。包括一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、網路社群經營，網路口碑行銷，網路消費者行為，網站績效管理，電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學可以獨當一面的充分了解和掌握網路行銷管理和網路創業的實務能力。
description.en: E-marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the e-marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how the to develope the business on the  internet.

name.zh: 工作生理與生醫訊號分析
name.en: Work physiology and biomedical signal analysis

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討與工作能力及績效有關之生理系統及外在因素，並藉由實驗操作教導學生測量分析生醫訊號之方法。課程內容包括： 1.骨骼肌肉系統 2.呼吸及循環系統 3.神經系統及運動控制 4.EMG及EKG測量分析 5.耗氧分析 6.疲勞與疲勞測試 6.人員體型與訓練效應 7.其他(高度﹑壓力﹑氧氣﹑酒精﹑藥物…)影響。
description.en: This course introduces intrinsic and extrinsic factors that affect performance of humans at work, and teaches techniques in measuring and analyzing related bio-signals through hand-on experiments.  Lectures cover topics of: muscular and skeletal system, respiration and circulation system, nerve system and motor control, EMG and EKG, O2 consumption and physical performance, fatigue assessment, body dimension and physical training, etc..

description.zh: 本課程目標為幫助學生建立問題解決之能力。課程將首先介紹目前用於解決多目標決策問題的一些數量方法，之後說明各種多目標決策方法及其適用的問題類型。上課方式主要透過講解、問答、作業、報告及考試的方式提升學生學習的效果。課程主要介紹的方法有如下AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Integral, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, Compromised Solutions及 De Novo。經由此課程的學習，學生於期末時應該可以培養各種解決多目標決策問題的技能。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the problem-solving abilities. The course will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods in multi-criteria decision-making problems (MCDM). The categories of MCDM and their applicable problems are then presented. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignments, term-projects and examinations. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Integral, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, Compromised Solutions and the ideas of De Novo. At the end of the course, students should have the skills when they face MCDM problems.

name.en: Period Studies in Literature and Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨為引導學生研究自20世紀初到第二次世界大戰西方文學的觀點。藉由閱讀現代主義者所創作的詩詞、散文及戲劇性文學，欣賞同時期的畫作、電影與音樂，進而研究與討論文學文化以期培養學生的對文學文化的欣賞。
description.en: From the dawn of the 20th century until approximately the time of WWII, a new perspective arose in Western literature and culture. The modernist aesthetic called for new ways of seeing, reading and conceiving the world. Text and visual art changed, both formally and thematically, and a new and enduring art form-cinema-came into being. We will be reading poetry, prose texts and dramatic works by key Modernist figures, viewing paintings and film representative of the era, and listening to a new kind of American classical music-jazz-shape itself from its blues roots. Through exposure to Modernist literature, visual art, music and film, students will be able to acquire a more sophisticated, nuanced view of modernity in its aesthetic expression, and a greater appreciation for the manner in which art and culture continually shape and reshape one another.

name.zh: 人文主義後之批判理論
name.en: Critical Theory from Humanism to Present

description.zh: 本課程引導學生研究自20世紀中期各領域的批判理論，文學、哲學、政治、女性主義、學術演講甚至是近期的新興理論都是研究要點。從20世紀中期主要批判理論包含現代主義與後現代主義、人文主義與後人文主義、結構主義與後結構主義、心理分析及解構主義。主要思想家則包含德勒茲、德希達、傅柯、李歐塔、巴迪歐、列維納斯及阿岡本。
description.en: In this course we will survey the variety of critical schools and approaches that have appeared beginning at around the mid-twentieth century.  Literary, philosophical, political, feminist, and other discourses have been significantly altered as a result of the new critical tools and vocabularies developed in recent years. The schools and approaches include: Modernism and Postmodernism, Humanism and Posthumanism, Structuralism and Poststructualism, Psychoanalysis, Deconstruction, Genealogical and Archeological History, and the Philosophies of Difference.  Major thinkers include: Bloom, Jameson, Deleuze, Lyotard, Foucault, Derrida, Blanchot, Irigary, Cixous, Heidegger, Badiou, Levinas, and Agamben.

The course objectives are to promote students to think planning of the future living space, and designing of a user-centered, service-oriented, sensitive, reflective, coordinated environment by digital interaction technology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.en: Theory and Technology on Particalte Matter

description.zh: 為使選習學生能熟悉環境中(尤其空氣中)之較大粒徑相關學理，本課程之介紹塵例行為其傳輸、反應之相關原理與防治、檢測分析等技術。其主要內容包括：1.環境中塵粒之來源、類型與分佈特性。2.塵粒傳輸理論。3.逸散現象之分析。4.揚塵理論。5.污染防治原理。6.檢測與分析技術。
description.en: Theory and Technology on Particalte Matter An introduction to the theory relative technology for particulate matter(pm) is firstly presented in the graduated course. Then, it will forcus on the following iterms to provide students a comprehensive and professional knowledge :1.Characteristics sources with particle size distriroution.2.Transport phenomena in air environmnet.3.Analysis of transport hpenomena for fugitive dust.4.Theory on particle entraiment or supension.5.Principle of control tenologies.6.Sampling and analysis for fugitive dust.

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

description.zh: 雷射乃20世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

notes: 機電所三組和製科所合開

name.zh: 醫療器材智慧財產權工程
name.en: Intellectual properties engineering on medical devices

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解智慧財產權在醫療器材領域之應用，尤其是專利之佈局，課程中會介紹產業發展趨勢與專利之關係。利用專利資訊進行產品設計與創新工程，也是學習之重點，醫療器材專利價值評估與其管理，亦為本課程之相關內容。
description.en: Course purpose:1. To describe how to use intellectual properties in medical device field2. To use patent information on medical device designs and to do the designing around3. To know patent value and IP managementTo understand how the medical device industry related to IP portfolio

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括:核能電廠系統熱流與安全分析、量化風險評估(Probabilistic Risk Assessment, 簡稱PRA)兩個主要部份。核能安全相關議題如，核反應器熱的產生、熱流與應力分析，核反應器重要系統與組件，核能電廠事故分析，核能電廠的環境輻射劑量。PRA技術可全面檢討核能電廠潛在弱點，提昇核電機組營運安全。內容包括基本機率理論介紹、隨機變數與分佈函數、可靠度方法論、事件樹與故障樹分析、不準度分析及傳播等方法。並將包括PRA技術在核能電廠系統之應用。
description.en: This lecture will mainly covers the thermal-hydraulics and safety analyses and the methods for probability of risk assessment (PRA) for nuclear power plants. Thermal hydraulics and safety analyses will includes: design of fission reactors; energy conversion in nuclear power systems; fluid flow system, thermal and structural analysis of reactor core. The weakness of nuclear power plants can be identified through the PRA technology. Therefore, the safety feature of the associated structures of systems and components will be improved. Lecture would include basic concept of probability, random variables and distribution functions, applications to the reliability assessment of components, event-tree and fault-tree analysis, uncertainty analysis and its propagation, etc. Examples and applications in nuclear plants will be addressed as well.

description.zh: 本課程在於介紹行動隨意網路的設計原理、架構與應用，內容主要涵蓋行動隨意網路各層的設計原理及架構。授課內容大綱如下：1.行動隨意網路簡介  2.行動隨意網路動態位址分配機制3.行動隨意網路之繞送協定4.行動隨意網路之多播協定  5.行動隨意網路之廣播協定  6.行動隨意網路MAC層之設計7.行動隨意網路傳輸層之設計8.行動隨意網路之品質保證  9.其他多點繞送網路之介紹
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to the design concepts and applications of mobile ad hoc networks. Covered topics will emphasize on the architecture and applications of mobile ad hoc networks and design principles of each layer. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.Introduction to MANET  2.Dynamic Addressing Techniques in Mobile Ad hoc Networks3.Routing protocols for MANETs4.Multicasting protocols for MANETs  5.Broadcasting storm  6.MAC protocols for MANETs  7.Transport protocols for MANETs  8.QoS in MANETs  9.Other Multi-hop networks

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 全球化中的英語語用學
name.en: English Pragmatics in the Era of Globalization

description.zh: 在此全球化之際，一種文化所發出的訊息很可能得從另一種文化來解讀，其間需要對於情境、語境、社會文化背景的熟悉與高度認知，通過這種高度認知方能瞭解整體篇章的意義。由於英文是國際企業的通用語言，因此現今全世界的英文教育都在戮力納入全球組織語言的系統性探討。此課程目標在於討論英語語用學在傳播與企業等領域的可能應用，同時培養思辯能力。此課程可能包含的議題如下： 	道地英語/文對於英文學習在語言及文化上的挑戰 	英語媒體和企業語言中的隱約/間接/譬喻表達用法 	社會文化經驗與事件交互作用下的情境語感及意義變化 	英語社會中新型態媒體的實際與象徵層面 	資訊廣告類型如何合併資訊與說服以達意圖效果 	跨文化情境中語用模式的策略契合與積極修飾 	多國企業之多重語言/文化團隊所亟需之溝通技巧
description.en: In the wake of globalization, a message encoded in one culture may have to be decoded in the other, which entails the ability of making sense of a discourse through a strong awareness of language pragmatics in contextualization. English as the language for international communication has made English education worldwide strive to incorporate a systematic exploration of global organizational language. This course aims to address the potential applications of English pragmatics to fields such as media and business and simultaneously develop awareness for critical thinking, which may include the following topics:  	The linguistic and cultural challenges of naturally-occurring English to EFL comprehension; 	The covert/indirect/figurative use of expressions in English-language media and corporate discourses;  	The contextual senses and variations in meaning of a discourse based on the matrix of sociocultural experiences and occurrences; 	The pragmatic and symbolic dimensions in the

name.en: Syntax: Theory and Application in English Teaching

description.zh: 本課程的目的是複習英語的句子結構，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。藉著採用不同英語教學方法，這種瞭解與知識有助於解答在英語教學上所遭遇的各種學習歷程的問題，尤其是寫作和翻譯的學習過程中。
description.en: This course reviews the sentence structures in English for a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By applying various English teaching methods, such knowledge can be helpful in dealing with problems that are frequently encountered when carrying out various learning activities in the classroom, especially essay writing and translation activities.

name.zh: 經典文學作品創意教學

description.zh: 本課程主旨在向各級學校的英語師資，或對西洋文學文化有興趣的社會人士，推薦英美文學經典作品作為創意教學的教材藍本，兼具創意教學此一領域的理論介紹與創作實務。學員們藉由對英美經典文學作品與其相關之多媒體文化產物的研讀和探索，激起反應、反省與靈感，進而以英文創作作為回饋，朝向創意產業邁進。本課程設計的目標在激發學員多方面的能力：（1）瞭解英美經典文學作品的文字之美與文化意涵、（2）用英語表達的習慣、（3）用英文創作的潛能、以及（4）進入英語文化創意產業的準備。
description.en: This course introduces English literary cannons as the basis for teaching creativity and the related theories and practices. Students will be exploring a series of multimedia and cultural products created based on English literary cannons and in terms creating their own works. Students of this course are expected to develop in these four aspects: 1. Understanding English literary cannons and their cultural implications; 2. Expressing oneself well in the English language; 3. Creating in the English language; 4. Equipping for the English cultural and literary creative industry.

description.zh: 人工智慧之軟式運算技術，包括基因演算法、類神經網路等，是向生物及自然演化現象取法的數種機器學習技術，提供模仿生物決策思維的系統分析方法，也開啟其於土木工程領域系統決策分析應用的研究方向。近年來電腦資訊科技的突飛猛進，催化人工智慧領域軟式運算技術的快速發展，並融入或然率之概念，發展非唯一解類神經網路、機率類神經網路、壓縮類神經網路及贅餘基因演算法等於土木工程領域之各種應用。課程中並配合作業、論文研討、報告及實際軟體介紹、操作以幫助學習。
description.en: Soft computing methods of artificial intelligence, including genetic algorithm and artificial neural network, are biologically inspired machine learning technology.  A genetic algorithm, which is a computational model that imitates the process of Darwinian evolution, is emerging as a powerful tool in optimization and design problems.  Neural networks provide massively parallel computational models and adaptive systems with properties of noise and fault tolerance as well as learning capacity.  All these classes of methods share some basic characteristics that are inherently different than those of traditional mathematically based engineering analysis.  This course will also introduce the recent progress on application of soft computing methods in civil engineering.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度的計算機圖學，介紹三維計算機繪圖原理、OpenGL、著色語言、繪圖管線、計算幾何、射線追蹤、體積成像繪圖，課程範圍包含計算機圖學最新的研究主題如物理模擬、射線投射、巨觀且聚焦技術、即時體積成像繪圖等等。
description.en: This course is a graduate-level computer graphics class. Topics include 3D computer graphics, OpenGL, shading language, graphics pipeline, computational geometry, ray tracing, and volume rendering. The course material cover topics of the state-of-the-art research problems, such as the physical simulation, ray casting, focus and context techniques for volume data for real-time rendering.

description.zh: 本課程著重於專利應用之策略，包含1. 如何建構商業導向情境規劃2. 技術挑戰3. 如何從專利池中聰明挑選你要的4. 描述與提供我們的專利策略5. 專利研發評估標準:產生個專利包含其商業面向與其他相關專利比較
description.en: Objective: focusing on the strategies for making patent applications.Keypoint:1. How to create a scenario architecture (business-oriented)2. Technology challenge3. How to smartly search in patent pool4. describing & proposing our patent strategies5. InnovationEvaluation:Try to produce a patent includes its biz domain, comparing other related patents

notes: 四資四與資工所合開,計網電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與實務界交流的平台，協助學生體驗發明程序之實務，透過邀請國內著名之發明家進行專題講座，經由發明人之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生之發明學習動機，開發其發明之創意潛能，並習得發明相關之理論與技巧，作為未來成為發明家之基石。
description.en: This curriculum provides the student and the practical real exchange platform, assists the student to experience practice of the invention procedure, carries on the subject talks by the invitation domestic renowned inventor, shares experience of by way of the inventor and inherits, stimulates invention of academic motivation the student, develops creativity of potential its invention, and the custom results in theory and the skill the invention related, will become cornerstone of the inventor as the future.

name.zh: 高科技產業的專利糾紛

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理、快速原型系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，快速原型與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
description.en: Principle of rapid prototyping, Classification of rapid prototyping systems, Analysis of manufacturing parameters and working results, Study of manufacturing equipments, Study of rapid tooling, Practice of rapid prototyping and rapid tooling, Special projects and discussion.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於將個體經濟學相關理論引用至企業管理決策上。討論主題包括供給與需求理論、市場需求預測、廠商理論、成本利潤分析、市場結構、定價策略與競爭者分析等議題。希望同學修習本課程後，更能瞭解如何利用經濟分析工具，更加精準並有效率地解決實務上所面臨的重要經營管理議題。
description.en: The course covers microeconomic concepts relevant to managerial decision-making. Topics include demand and supply analysis, consumer demand forecasting, production and cost analysis, market structure, pricing policies and competitor analysis. This course will help students to have a better understanding of the economic tools and their potential use for solving real-world problems.

name.zh: 顧客行為與互動行銷決策

description.zh: 顧客會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓顧客認同。這表示，「與顧客的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和顧客直接對話的空間。這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以顧客行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Customer buying  behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, customer buying behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

name.zh: 全球企業協商談判與管理
name.en: Negotiation and Management in Global Business

description.zh: 從全球企業經營者觀點來探討協商談判的有關問題，目的在提供學生對協商談判專業知識的瞭解與管理，並熟悉協商談判的實務運用。協商談判是一種交易，是不斷發現問題的過程，也是集合策略與智慧的溝通藝術。全球企業協商談判即是在全球化市場上了解雙方需求，溝通折衝，解決衝突問題的過程。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式以協商談判模式運作為主，並分組針對協商談判議題研討與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of global business executive focus into the issues of negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. Negotiation is a kind of trade and an on-going process of problem uncovering, as well as a communications art that synthesizes strategies and wisdoms. Accordingly, Global business negotiation and management is a process of mutual understanding, communicating, and conflicts and problems solving in the business. The negotiation topics cover nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model of negotiation  and  to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can provide groups discussion and improve negotiate strategy.

notes: 林明杰1學分黃河明1學分胡幼研823胡幼圃（1.0）

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

notes: 車輛所和職車輛所合開

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.射頻技術發展2.射頻接收機架構簡介與分析3.射頻發射機架構簡介與分析4.增益鏈路預算5.雜訊鏈路預算6.非線性效應之分析與計算7.鎖相迴路設計與分析學生能從這門課學習到射頻收發模組的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.Development of RF Technology2.Introduction and Analysis of RF Receiver Architecture3.Introduction and Analysis of RF Transmitter Architecture4.Analysis of Gain Budget5.Analysis of Noise Budget6.Analysis and Calculation of Non-linearity Effect7.Analysis and Design of RF Phase Lock LoopThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF transceivers from this course.

description.zh: 1.軟體工程簡介 2.專案規劃 3.系統需求分析 4.系統設計方法 5.程式設計方法 6.程式與系統測試 7.系統維護方法
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Projest Planning 3.Requirements Analysis 4.System Design 5.Program Design 6.Program & System Testing 7.System Maintenance

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

name.zh: 生醫植入晶片系統實務
name.en: Special Projects on Biomedical Integrated System

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供修課學生對於生醫植入晶片在實務上的設計與應用。利用晶片植入系統擷取動物的生理參數或用以治療疾病，瞭解生理參數所代表的意義，以及設計新的生醫晶片系統架構來提昇目前的醫療技術。
description.en: The object of this course is to provide students for learning the special projects on Biomedical integrated system. Using the system to capture the animals' physiological parameters or to treatment diseases, and understand the meaning of these physiological parameters. Moreover, some techniques can be developed for improving the existing technologies.

notes: 期中考後上課時間為星期一5678

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供生醫晶片之基本知識 ，及生醫晶片電路設計之設計方法。課程內容首先介紹生醫晶片的發展現況，及如何利用微機電製程及CMOS相容製程來感測生醫訊號，接著介紹用來處理生醫訊號的前段類比電路，及之後數位類比轉換電路。最後再介紹如何利用無線電路及可植入式的介面作訊號之傳遞，而形成一完整之生醫晶片電路。
description.en: The object of Bio-Medical Circuit Design is to introduce the basic Bio-Medical knowledge and train students design the Bio-Medical circuit. The course will first introduce the development of the Bio-Medical chip and MEMs process. It also includes Low Noise Analog Front-End Circuit, ADC, Implantable interface circuit and Low Power Wireless Circuit design.

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.散射參數與網路分析儀2.頻譜儀介紹3.自動化量測4.平面化傳輸線5.射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配6.積體電路封裝7.射頻耦合器8.射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

name.zh: 互動式娛樂服務之音訊處理技術
name.en: Audio Signal Processing for Interactive Entertainment Services

description.zh: 本課程講述音訊處理技術之理論與實務，並著重於互動式娛樂服務之應用。理論部分包括聲音訊號的分析與辨識、電子音樂的產生、內涵式音樂檢索原理、以及空間音場等問題介紹。透過實際應用的探討，使學生獲得理論知識與設計創意。實務部分則以卡拉OK服務平台為核心，於課後作業及期末專題實作中，藉由軟體模擬、DSP開發平台、與手持行動裝置的程式設計，使學生應用電子音樂技術、音樂檢索技術、與空間音場原理來實現一卡拉OK系統，突破一般居家或手持行動裝置的功能限制，提升歌唱情境。
description.en: The course is designed to equip students with knowledge and skills in audio signal processing, particularly in the applications of interactive entertainment services. It covers both theory and practice of audio signal analysis and recognition, electronic music production, content-based music retrieval, and spatial audio effects. Through the use of personal computers, DSP platforms, and handheld devices, students will learn to apply the audio signal processing techniques to the design of interactive karaoke services.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

description.zh: 檢查這具有價值和道德的建築社會和這身為建築師角色的扮演當進入這決策流程的建築的組織中時, 社會的視覺影像的檢驗及文化在社會文句具體化的呈現和他們相互的關係轉換到選擇性方案的設計都市的空間與地方。學生描述在社會的分析和設計理論考慮社會的思想如何落實設計和都市的空間的運作．學生將建議可能的理論的文句來達成上述之目標外同時證明他們對設計的提議是可被檢驗的。
description.en: Examines the values and ethics of an architectural society and the input of the architect into the decision-making process of an architectural organization.  An examination of visions of society and culture embodied in social texts and their relation to the design of alternative urban spaces and places.Students draw on social analysis and design theory to consider how social thought informs design and the production of urban space.  In addition, students suggest possible theoretical texts justifying their design proposals.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線2.散射參數3.微波主動元件4.寬頻放大電路5.低雜訊放大電路6.功率放大器7.高穩定振盪器8.壓控振盪器9.鎖相迴路10.混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 本課程旨在使同學具體了解位於環太平洋地震帶之台灣，耐震安全對建築物之重要性；課程主要教授地震工程基本常識，以及耐震規範之靜力分析理論與台灣耐震工程現況等內容。
description.en: This course is aimed at making students realize the importance of seismic safety of buildings in Taiwan, which is located on Circum-Pacific seismic zone. The contents mainly include the fundamental topics of earthquake engineering, seismic design using static force regulated by building codes, and the practice and research on earthquake engineering in Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在於讓研究所學生就建築構造與施工學們有進階性之認識、探討與操作。故包含講義授課、校外專家專業分享(結合雙師計畫)、實務課題分組操作等進行方式。廣義之建築構造應包含:建築材料應用、建築構法原理、設計與介面整合、建築生產與管理等面向，故本課程以上述關鍵詞進行為期十八周的訓練。期望訓練研究生具有獨立專業思考、整合技術、發掘現場課題、創出新生產手法之能力。
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents: Introduction of contemporary System Theory Divide and unify of building systems Concepts and methods of System Integration Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

name.zh: 全球行銷通路策略與管理
name.en: Global Marketing Channel Strategy and Management

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程、通路行為與通路策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in Channels Strategy. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, and channel strategy.

description.zh: 主要內容在介紹並探討變量間相互關係及建立模式的技術，討論的主題以財金實證研究中常用的分析模型為主，包括銀行效率的估算，隨機邊界法，資料包絡法，以及門檻值迴歸模型，分位數迴歸等。在資料包絡法的部分，在於探討如何以資料包絡分析進行績效評估的概念及方法，並提供合法完整版自由軟體供學生實地操作，本課程強調理論與實作並重，使學生除了熟悉理論之外，並落實於實際的運算，有助於未來的研究。
description.en: The main issue is to investigate and model the relationship between variables. Discussion topics are related to econometric skills frequently used in financial empirical studies, including banking efficiencies, stochastic frontier analysis, data envelopment analysis, threshold model, and quantile regression model. For data envelopment analysis, the purpose of this course is to let the students understand the basic theory, models, and applications of the data envelopment analysis. So that students will not only understand the theory but are also able to run the software and do calculations.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容綜合了組織設計與組織行為的重要議題，例如組織設計、領導統御、組織文化與氣候、政治行為、員工激勵、以及員工態度與情感等等。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of organization theory and organization behavior, including organization design, leadership, organizational culture and climate, political behavior, motivation, workplace attitudes and emotions.

name.en: Special topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源管理的各項重要研究議題，包括招募、甄選、訓練、績效評估、薪資管理、以及知識管理等。此外，本課程也將介紹諸多有關組織管理研究方法的議題。
description.en: This course introduces many research topics of human resource management, such as recruitment, selection, training, performance appraisal, compensation, and knowledge management. In addition, we will discuss many issues regarding the research methods in organization studies.

description.zh: 本課程介紹公司管理者在作財務決策時，會產生心理偏誤，進而做出不適當的財務決策。另外，本課程也提供管理者如何避免心理偏誤，並改善其財務決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討公司理財的決策。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect managers' financial decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc.

description.zh: 1.照明光源及燈具介紹：白熾燈、螢光燈、弧光燈、LED燈2.輻射度學、光度學、色度學之基本物理概念與單位3.照明光度學之量測方法與儀器介紹4.點光源之照度計算 5.多光源之平均照度計算 6.照度之品質與評價7.幾何光學：折射、反射、全反射、散射、材料色散、吸收、螢光激發 8.LED的發光原理與特性指標：顏色、效率、壽命、光形、光譜、熱散 9.白光LED的特徵：色溫、演色性 10.LED光源的封裝與二次光學透鏡
description.en: 1.(Lighting Luminaire: Incandescent Lamp, Fluorescent Lamp, High Intensity Discharge lamp, LED Lamp)2.concepts and Units of Radiometry/Photometry/Colorimetry3.Photometry Test Method and Understanding Test Report4.Calcuating Illuminance at a Point5.Average illuminance Calculation6.Quantity and Quality of Illumination7.Geometric optics8.Characteristics of LED 9.White light LED Characteristics: CCT and CRI10.Optical package and Secondary optics for LED

notes: 計網電腦教室,光電所和最後一哩合開,限30人

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類與其短脈衝產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to short pulse generation below one picosecond, ultrafast laser has been widely used in military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kind of the ultrafast laser、principle of mode-locked pulse generation、pulse compression technique and the method of ultrashort pulse measurement.  Various application of ultrafast laser including fluorescence measurement, pump-probe measurement and nonlinear optics measurement has also been included in this course.

description.zh: 本課程的主題將集中於奈米薄膜的光學性質，討論介質以及金屬鍍膜材料所製作的奈米結構。本課程將介紹許多新穎的應用，包括完美抗反射、偏極轉換器、偏極分光器與完美波片。進一步根據局部電漿效應對於金屬與介質複合薄膜的影響可發展超穎材料薄膜。本課程包含設計、製程與量測，透過課程學習，學生可學會奈米光學薄膜的完整知識。(1)課程簡介(2)斜向沉積技術技術(3)光學非均向薄膜(4)等效介質理論(5)表面電漿理論 (6)長程表面電漿 (7)超穎材料 (8)完美抗反射與波板 (9)感測技術 (10)仿生薄膜 (11)偏極態量測 (12)橢圓偏光儀
description.en: The topics of this course will focus on optical properties of nanostructured thin films. The discussed nanostructures are made of common used dielectric and metal coating materials. Many novel applications including perfect antireflection, polarization converter, beam splitters, and perfect waveplate will be introduced here. Furthermore, deposited metamaterial thin films are developed based on local plasmon effect within the metal-dielectric composite films. This course involves design, fabrication and measurement. The students should have learned and passed the course.(1) Introduction (2) Oblique angle deposition (3) Optical anisotropic thin films (4) Effective Medium Approximation (5) Plasmonics (6) Long range surface plasmon (7) Metamaterials (8) Perfect antireflection and waveplate(9) Sensing technique (10) Bioinspired and biomimetic thin films (11) Polarization measurements (12) Ellipsometry

notes: 需先修光學薄膜設計與應用課程及格者,始可選修。

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。本課程亦將論及禪學觀念與管理的關聯性，提供學生一個東方觀點的管理藝術，幫助學生瞭解禪在企業管理應用的基本理念與價值；將禪的卓越智慧運用於公司的治理決策。學生們將被要求從事一項對目前工商界中具企業倫理公司治理的調查分析與評論。
description.en: This course discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity). This course will also discuss the relations between Zen and management. It introduces the Eastern management art to the students helping them understand how the concept and values of Zen can assist the decision-making in corporate governance.

notes: 吳玲玲0.5 賴永吉1合授教室科研825

name.zh: 國際專業證照實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本國際專業證照實務講座課程針對國內外國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照MOS-PowerPoint 與MOS-ACCESS考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 四管三.經管所和最後一哩合開,限10人,五567節

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程著重通訊工程中多種與電磁波相關元件之分析與設計，包括各式通訊高頻組件分析、輻射特性與導波特性研究、以及其他新型微波與毫米波頻段之電路與天線
description.en: This purpose of this course is to design and analysis the key components in communication engineering by using electromagnetics. It includes the network analysis of various wireless communication components, investigations of electromagnetic waves in the bounded and unbounded region, and other novel circuits and antennas in microwave and millimeter-wave frequency.

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-創造力提升就業力

description.zh: 在面對全球平均每一天誕生7.8個新科博士、平均每小時產出6.5個碩士及平均每分鐘製造0.7個大專生的高學歷高就業競爭環境下，台灣1111人力銀行公佈調查指出，87%的台灣應屆大學畢業生擔心畢業即失業，較去年增加約10%，企業主要招聘以積極度為首要考慮，比率為50.89%，技能專業證照居次，表達能力、履歷陳述方式、畢業科技、應對進退禮儀、外語能力及實習經歷等也受到重視。如何提昇學生就業能力，將成為學校培育人才的重要課題。　　就業達人講座配合最後一哩課程開設，於課堂中以模擬面試等議題來強化同學就業知識；面對激烈的人才競爭環境，必須不斷充電，提高競爭力，也要聰明掌握工作時間與效率的方法，職場不僅要會『做事』更要會『做人』才能在職場上如魚游水，讓你成為未來職場大贏家！
description.en: This course is designed to foster a student's ability to effectively communication skill, time management, pressure management, interview and the planning of the career by the human resources personnel and executives in the distinct industries to promote students the power of career competitive. Being able to effectively communicate is a skill that enhances many areas in life. In a job interview, clear communication is of the utmost importance, as employers are looking for people who can seamlessly fit into an existing setting and perform well under pressure. For today's world is full of competition, everyone is trying to outpace others in the race. Students need to face competitors from all over the world. If students need to succeed in a world full of competition. They will need deeper learning to succeed in college and prepare for careers. Therefore, these courses will benefit students in the long run.

notes: 四電四甲乙丙.電機所和最後一哩合開,三ABC

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生熟悉零售策略的基本概念，了解目前的零售產業之環境分析及零售趨勢之分析，探討零售行銷之區隔與定位，進而將零售策略如何應用於管理理論與實務分析。零售業包含百貨業、連鎖店、超市、超商等，與人們的關係極切，本課程主在探討如何經由零賣出使顧客滿意的商品。 內容：零售業概論、配銷通路、行銷研究、產品管理策略、定價策略、促銷策略、賣場規劃、零售業經營策略、顧客滿意1.具備零售管理學相關知識與概念。2.掌握零售業環境與趨勢之分析能力。3.具備零售業行銷區隔與定位的分析能力。4.具備零售策略應用於理論與實務之分析能力。
description.en: This masters-level course is designed to provide the student with a deeper understanding of retailing strategic management. Topics include: the world of retailing, electronic and no store retailing, the retail customer behavior, retail market strategy, retail location, merchandise management and store management. Retail management is mainly to discuss to sell goods through channels and satisfy them. The content of the course: Retail concept, physical distribution, market research, product management strategy, pricing strategy, promotion strategy, retail strategy and customer satisfaction.

description.zh: 廣告策略與企畫為廣告之進階課程,學生需結合行銷,廣告,創意,消費者心理及行為等領域之知識,並具備優秀之企畫能力,為所指定之企業,產品或理念規畫完整之整合行銷傳播企畫案。
description.en: nternational Advertising and Media Strategy takes a market-oriented approach to the total campaign. The course interrelates planning, creative and technical skills with emphasis on problem-solving and marketing communications.

description.zh: 概論，飛行器介紹，飛行空氣動力學，飛行運動方程式，穩定性與控制，旋翼空氣動力學，旋翼機控制，穩定與控制係數，各軸項之運動分析，控制響應，飛行自動控制設計與分析。
description.en: Introduction, Review of Flying Vehicles, Aerodynamics of Flight, Equations of Motion, Stability and Control, Rotor Aerodynamics, Control of Rotorcraft, Stability and Control Derivatives, Motion Analysis, Control Response, Design and Analysis of Automatic Flight System.

name.en: Civil Engineering Colloquy on Special Topics b

description.zh: 土木專題特論乃透過國際學者的講課，讓學生學習土木相關領域的重要知識及了解最先進之研究成果或最新開發成品。
description.en: This course will provide important knowledge and information regarding to the latest development or application on the field of civil engineering. Speakers being invited are well-known international scholars in the related area.

description.zh: 螢光材料已經應用到很多的領域，如顯示器，照明，醫療，太陽能電池等，因此，本門課程將講解螢光發光現象與螢光材料的原理、應用及製造技術。另外將特別介紹顯示器與照明領域的當前的形勢和未來發展願景。
description.en: Luminescent materials have been applied to a lot of fields such as emissive displays, lighting, medicine, solar cells, etc. Therefore, this course explains principles, applications and fabrication technologies of luminescence   phenomena and materials. Especially, present situation and future prospect of displays and lighting will be introduced.

notes: 中西洋一郎教授,周二678節和周三234節上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養- TOP20台灣國際品牌
name.en: Feast for the global perspective -TOP20 Taiwan Global Brand

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,二ABC節

name.zh: 企業講座-美商奇異國際(股)公司

description.zh: 本課程主旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、擴充事業版圖、多角化經營。企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該集團各事業體相關之營運情形，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,四ABC節

name.zh: 創業講座-創業楷模˙實務宴饗
name.en: Practical experience shared by model of entrepreneurs

description.zh: 邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,三ABC節

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.
